description:
House slave grace has been wrestling on Ultimate Surrender and The House is
concerned she may be getting an unwarranted sense of dominance. The Pope and
the Steward offer her a chance to try out her moves in the lounge. The
result is a two on one take down scene where a squirming and howling grace
has her nubile body placed in submissions holds and pulled up in a back
breaking 3 point suspension using her hair as one of the tie points.
After the House has subdued grace, she is further humiliated and rewarded
when one of her Ultimate Surrender competitors, Rain Degrey, is invited to
the lounge use punish and use grace as she sees fit. Grace is tormented and
made to please Rains insatiable pussy while being fucked relentlessly from
behind.
title: Service Day: Ultimate Submission
